sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HomeServiceService } from 'src/app/Services/home-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent implements OnInit { getAddress:any getEmail:any getPhone:any getTodays:any constructor(private service:HomeServiceService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getContactFun() } getContactFun() { this.getAddress=this.service.getContactSer[3].address; this.getEmail=this.service.getContactSer[1].email; this.getPhone=this.service.getContactSer[0].phone; this.getTodays=this.service.getContactSer[2].todays; } }
